messages.message: The copper rate will be adjusted and locked in at the time of order entry. The copper rate is adjusted on the 1st of every month per Omega-Camden Base Price Notice as received by the International Wire Group Inc. Lapp USA may consider an update to the copper rate during the month if Omega-Camden index changes 20 cents per pound or more from the last established price.
Copper Rate today: ${copper-rate} / LB (Omega Camden)
All items are subject to prior sale.
Subject to Credit approval
Quote is good for 30 days from pricing date
Price based on one time purchase for complete bill of material as listed
Up to 25% of quote value returnable under standard return policy, balance of value quoted as non-cancelable non-returnable
